import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', standalone:true, templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { mediaList = [ { title: 'Buchtitel', type: 'Buch', author: 'Max Mustermann', pages: 350, language: 'Deutsch', status: 'Gelesen' }, { title: 'Filmname', type: 'Film', duration: 120, director: 'Steven Spielberg', status: 'Geschaut' }, { title: 'Spielname', type: 'PS-Spiel', players: 4, platform: 'PlayStation 5', status: 'Gespielt' } ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } getKeys(medium: any): string[] { return Object.keys(medium); } }
